pullrequest.title: Add test for HarnessPlugin, reduce likelihood of race condition (#2034)

content.raw: for this `DetachUnpaused` test, we have less control over the sim-time when this expectation is evaluated, and the harness is using a PID which lets it bounce around a bit. If we waited much longer (1 second or more), we could possibly have a tighter bound on the velocity, but I didn't bother
content.html: for this DetachUnpaused test, we have less control over the sim-time when this expectation is evaluated, and the harness is using a PID which lets it bounce around a bit. If we waited much longer (1 second or more), we could possibly have a tighter bound on the velocity, but I didn't bother
